mapper.select: select base_salary_tax as baseSalaryTax, overtime_salary_tax as overtimeSalaryTax, night_salary_tax as nightSalaryTax, holiday_salary_tax as holidaySalaryTax, care_salary_tax as careSalaryTax, reward_salary_tax as rewardSalaryTax, meal_tax as mealTax, business_salary_tax as businessSalaryTax from salary_tax

select base_year as year, min_salary as minSalary, max_salary as maxSalary, pension_employee_insurance as pensionEmployeeInsurance, pension_company_insurance as pensionCompanyInsurance, health_employee_insurance as healthEmplyoeeInsurance, health_company_insurance as healthCompanyInsurance, longterm_employee_insurance as longtermEmployeeInsurance, longterm_company_insurance as longtermCompanyInsurance, employment_employee_insurance as employmentEmployeeInsurance, employment_company_insurance as employmentCompnayInsurance, industrial_company_insurance as industrialCompanyInsurance from INSURANCE_CONTRIBUTIONS
